info.name: Bucket API v1
info.description: The API served through the bucket-webapp. Project found at: [https://github.com/972C8/bucket-webapp](https://github.com/972C8/bucket-webapp).

item.name: Upload new profile picture (for current avatar)

request.description: New profile picture is created and assigned to the current user

item.name: Get profile picture of current avatar
bucket-items

request.description: Create a new bucket item and reference prior created bucket, location, image, and labels using the example format.

response.name: Create bucket item

item.name: Upload new  image for bucket item

request.description: Upload new image that can be referenced when creating a new bucket item

response.name: Get bucket item by id

item.name: Get all bucket items (of current avatar)

request.description: Filter the results using the provided query params.

response.name: Get all bucket items (of current avatar)

item.description: API requests concerning the buckets (categories of bucket items)

request.description: Returns the address in url encoded format and ready to be used by google maps
